metadata.synopsis: Tells the finishing part of the story conveyed by the paintings in a puzzle. Does not finish the story correctly.

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *'The Cell.' A stern prison guard slides a warm meal into the thief's cell.*

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *The red-haired man has a tenday left to serve, judging by the scratchings on the wall behind him.*
